{"id":865607039,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1672036505,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"228 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/865607039/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"9.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int token = 1;\n        unordered_map<char,int> vis;\n        unordered_map<char, int> index;\n        int maxLen = 0;\n        int currLen = 0;\n        int l = s.length();\n        for(int i=0; i<l; i++){\n            if(vis[s[i]] != token){\n                vis[s[i]] = token;\n                index[s[i]] = i;\n                currLen++;\n            }\n            else{\n                token++;\n                maxLen = max(maxLen, currLen);\n                currLen = 0;\n                i = index[s[i]];\n            }\n        }\n        return max(maxLen, currLen);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
